code: import thunk from"redux-thunk";import logger from"redux-logger";import rootReducer from"reducers";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{persistStore,persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storage},persistReducerConfig=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer),store=createStore(persistReducerConfig,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunk,logger))),persistor=persistStore(store);export{persistor,store};
